Class ExamManageController

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.controller.ExamManageController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ExamManageController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class for managing exams in the examination system. This class handles the user interface for creating, updating, deleting, and filtering exams, as well as displaying associated questions.

      public boolean HasDuplicate(Question newQuestion)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
